DOC.detailed_description: This four month , outpatient , single center study investigate whether transcranial , high intensity LED apply outside skull improve frontal lobe executive function work memory participant chronic , mild Traumatic Brain Injury ( TBI ) , without mild posttraumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) , due close head injury . Participants sign Informed Consent Form ( ICF ) Neuropsychological Screening test administer . If participant 's neuropsychological screen test score meet Inclusion/Exclusion criterion participant meet Inclusion/Exclusion criterion , he/she test test part Neuropsychological Outcome Measures , week Transcranial LED treatment , week last LED treatment one two month last LED treatment . Treatment Transcranial LED 6 week . Participants treat three time per week : Monday , Wednesday Friday . A total 18 Transcranial LED treatment administer .
